body_html: just a thought: If you are testing this on staging (where you might have a “student” role as well as an “organiser” role) that might be the reason why you can delete the empty role and a “simple” student might not be able to. have you tried testing locally with a “login as user” feature (or changing your role to student-only)?

body: just a thought: If you are testing this on staging (where you might have a “student” role as well as an “organiser” role) that might be the reason why you can delete the empty role and a “simple” student might not be able to. have you tried testing locally with a “login as user” feature (or changing your role to student-only)?
